(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VB have)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ hidden) (NNP Gourmet) (NNP Chef) (NN inside))
        (PP (IN of)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (ADVP (RB just))
            (VP (VBG waiting)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB be)
                    (VP (VBN awakened))))))))))
    (. ?)))


aux(have-3, Do-1)
nsubj(have-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
det(inside-8, a-4)
amod(inside-8, hidden-5)
nn(inside-8, Gourmet-6)
nn(inside-8, Chef-7)
dobj(have-3, inside-8)
prep(inside-8, of-9)
nsubj(waiting-12, you-10)
advmod(waiting-12, just-11)
pcomp(of-9, waiting-12)
aux(awakened-15, to-13)
auxpass(awakened-15, be-14)
xcomp(waiting-12, awakened-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Well))
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (MD could)
      (VP (VB be)
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NN opportunity))))
    (. !)))


advmod(opportunity-6, Well-1)
nsubj(opportunity-6, this-2)
aux(opportunity-6, could-3)
cop(opportunity-6, be-4)
poss(opportunity-6, your-5)
root(ROOT-0, opportunity-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Gourmet) (NN Kitchen))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (VP (VBG offering)
        (NP
          (NP (CD two) (NNS places))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS readers)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB attend)
                    (NP (PRP$ their) (NN introduction))
                    (PP (TO to)
                      (NP
                        (NP (NNP Gourmet) (NNP Cooking) (NN course))
                        (SBAR
                          (WHNP (WDT which))
                          (S
                            (VP (MD will)
                              (VP (VB feature)
                                (NP (NN foundation) (NNS skills))
                                (PP (IN in)
                                  (NP (NNP Gourmet) (NNP Cooking)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(Kitchen-3, The-1)
nn(Kitchen-3, Gourmet-2)
nsubj(offering-5, Kitchen-3)
aux(offering-5, is-4)
root(ROOT-0, offering-5)
num(places-7, two-6)
dobj(offering-5, places-7)
prep(places-7, for-8)
poss(readers-10, our-9)
pobj(for-8, readers-10)
aux(attend-12, to-11)
infmod(readers-10, attend-12)
poss(introduction-14, their-13)
dobj(attend-12, introduction-14)
prep(attend-12, to-15)
nn(course-18, Gourmet-16)
nn(course-18, Cooking-17)
pobj(to-15, course-18)
nsubj(feature-21, which-19)
aux(feature-21, will-20)
rcmod(course-18, feature-21)
nn(skills-23, foundation-22)
dobj(feature-21, skills-23)
prep(feature-21, in-24)
nn(Cooking-26, Gourmet-25)
pobj(in-24, Cooking-26)

              (NNS sauces))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD 100))
      (PP (IN per)
        (NP
          (NP (NN head))
          (PP (CC but)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ lucky) (CD 2) (NNS readers))))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB get)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP
              (VP (VB attend)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (ADJP (JJ free)
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN charge))))))
              (CC but)
              (RB not)
              (VP
                (ADVP (RB totally))
                (JJ free)))))))
    (. .)))

prep(100-1, per-2)
pobj(per-2, head-3)
prep(head-3, but-4)
det(readers-8, the-5)
amod(readers-8, lucky-6)
num(readers-8, 2-7)
dep(but-4, readers-8)
aux(get-10, will-9)
root(ROOT-0, get-10)
aux(attend-12, to-11)
xcomp(get-10, attend-12)
nsubj(free-14, it-13)
xcomp(attend-12, free-14)
prep(free-14, of-15)
pobj(of-15, charge-16)
cc(attend-12, but-17)
conj(attend-12, not-18)
advmod(free-20, totally-19)
dep(attend-12, free-20)

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (INTJ (VB please))
      (VP (VB write)
        (PRT (RP in))
        (PP
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP me))
              (PP (IN at)
                (NP (NN leslie.tay@gmail.com)))))
          (CC and)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (QP (JJR less) (IN than) (CD 100))
              (NNS words))))))
    (VP (VBD let)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP me))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB why))
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (CC and)
                  (NP (PRP$ your) (NN friend)))
                (VP (VBP deserve)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB go)
                        (PP (IN for)
                          (NP (DT the) (NNP Culinary) (NNP Skills) (NNP Course)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


discourse(write-2, please-1)
csubj(let-14, write-2)
prt(write-2, in-3)
prep(write-2, to-4)
pobj(to-4, me-5)
prep(me-5, at-6)
pobj(at-6, leslie.tay@gmail.com-7)
cc(to-4, and-8)
conj(to-4, in-9)
mwe(than-11, less-10)
quantmod(100-12, than-11)
num(words-13, 100-12)
pobj(in-9, words-13)
root(ROOT-0, let-14)
nsubj(know-16, me-15)
ccomp(let-14, know-16)
advmod(deserve-22, why-17)
nsubj(deserve-22, you-18)
cc(you-18, and-19)
poss(friend-21, your-20)
conj(you-18, friend-21)
advcl(know-16, deserve-22)
aux(go-24, to-23)
xcomp(deserve-22, go-24)
prep(go-24, for-25)
det(Course-29, the-26)
nn(Course-29, Culinary-27)
nn(Course-29, Skills-28)
pobj(for-25, Course-29)

  (S
    (ADVP (RB once))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN won)
        (S
          (NP (DT the) (NNS tickets))
          (VP (VB please)
            (VP (VB ensure)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP you))
                  (VP (MD will)
                    (VP (VB attend)
                      (NP (DT the) (NN course)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Please)
      (NP (NN note))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (DT this))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (NP (DT a) (JJ special) (CD 2) (NN day) (NN course))))
          (CC but)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (MD will)
              (VP (VB cover)
                (NP (CD 80) (NN %))))))))))
